actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to $70,800, and to provide an inflation adjustment of such amount.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the unified tax credit for both estate and gift taxes from $47,000 to $70,800 over a five-year phase-in period, with annual adjustments for each succeeding year after such period.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to $70,800, and to provide an inflation adjustment of such amount.
